instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings. Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap Apps . Scroll left to the ALL tab. Tap the desired application. Tap Disable . If Disable is not available, it means the app is preloaded and has been updated.
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap Apps . Scroll left to the ALL tab. Tap the desired application. Disable apps are at the bottom of the list. Tap Enable .
